title: Card: Interaction linked
code:
<gds-card-linked href="#" variant="primary" aspect-ratio="16/9" width="240px" margin="auto" justify-content="center" text-align="center" align-items="center" gap="m">
  <gds-flex align-items="center" justify-content='center' aspect-ratio="1/1" padding="xs" background="brand-01" border-radius="max" color="neutral-03">
    <gds-icon-copy size="l"></gds-icon-copy>
  </gds-flex>
  <gds-text font="detail-book-m">Replace this slot with your content.</gds-text>
</gds-card>
